mapper.select: select * from good_stock t1 inner join good_main t2 on t1.gid = t2.id and t2.name = #{stock.name}

select t1.id as id, t2.label as label, t2.name as name, t1.price as price, t1.stock as stock, t1.comment as comment, t1.gid as gid, t3.price as hunterPrice, t4.price as LangYuePrice
from good_stock t1 inner join good_main t2 on t1.gid = t2.id left join goods t3 on t3.gid =t1.gid and t3.shop = '宁波老猎人电玩店' and t3.etl_date =(select max(etl_date) from goods) left join goods t4 on t4.gid =t1.gid and t4.shop = 'nicewg' and t4.etl_date =(select max(etl_date) from goods)

select t1.id as id, t1.gid as gid, t2.label as label, t2.name as name, t1.price as price, t1.stock as stock, t1.gid as gid, t3.base as base, t3.include1 , t3.include2 , t3.include3 , t3.enclude1 , t3.enclude2 , t3.enclude3 from good_stock t1 inner join good_main t2 on t1.gid = t2.id left join good_key_word t3 on t1.gid = t3.gid

select t1.id as id, t2.label as label, t2.name as name, t1.price as price, t1.stock as stock, t1.comment as comment, t1.gid as gid from good_stock t1 inner join good_main t2 on t1.gid = t2.id and gid =#{gid}
